ACKAY.summary: ArÃ§elik Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, produces, markets, sells, services, imports, and exports consumer durable goods and consumer electronics in Turkey and internationally. It operates through White Goods, Consumer Electronics, and Other segments. The company offers built-in and freestanding appliances, such as refrigerators, freezers, washing machines, dryers, dishwashers, ovens, hobs, hoods, warming drawers, microwave ovens, and water dispensers and water filtration appliances; and small household appliances, including vacuum and steam cleaners, kitchen appliances, personal and garment care appliances, and fans. It also provides consumer electronics comprising televisions, computers, smart phones, notebooks and tablets, POS cash registers, Hi-Fi systems, and portable audio systems; and heating and ventilation systems consisting of air conditioners, boilers, and water and room heaters. In addition, the company offers components, which include hermetic compressors, industrial motors, and appliances motor-pumps; and furnitures. It offers its products under the ArÃ§elik, Beko, Blomberg, Arctic, Grundig, Altus, Flavel, Elektrabregenz, Leisure, Defy, and Dawlance brands. The company was incorporated in 1955 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ALCTL.IS.summary: Alcatel Lucent Teletas TelekomÃ¼nikasyon A.S. produces and sells telecommunication equipment in Turkey. The company operates in three segments: IP/Optical/Mobile Network, Fixed Network, and Application & Analytics. It primarily offers telephone exchanges and transmission devices. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

ARCLK.IS.summary: ArÃ§elik Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, produces, markets, sells, services, imports, and exports consumer durable goods and consumer electronics in Turkey and internationally. It operates through White Goods, Consumer Electronics, and Other segments. The company offers built-in and freestanding appliances, such as refrigerators, freezers, washing machines, dryers, dishwashers, ovens, hobs, hoods, warming drawers, microwave ovens, and water dispensers and water filtration appliances; and small household appliances, including vacuum and steam cleaners, kitchen appliances, personal and garment care appliances, and fans. It also provides consumer electronics comprising televisions, computers, smart phones, notebooks and tablets, POS cash registers, Hi-Fi systems, and portable audio systems; and heating and ventilation systems consisting of air conditioners, boilers, and water and room heaters. In addition, the company offers components, which include hermetic compressors, industrial motors, and appliances motor-pumps; and furnitures. It offers its products under the ArÃ§elik, Beko, Blomberg, Arctic, Grundig, Altus, Flavel, Elektrabregenz, Leisure, Defy, and Dawlance brands. The company was incorporated in 1955 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ARDYZ.IS.long_name: ARD Grup Bilisim Teknolojileri Anonim Sirketi
ARDYZ.IS.summary: ARD Grup Bilisim Teknolojileri A.S. engages in the software, information technology, communication, and telecommunication businesses in Turkey. The company provides E-Invoice, a solution for preparation and sharing of invoices used in enterprises in a digital environment; E-Archive that allows to store, submit, and report invoices in electronic media; national law software solutions; cloud solutions; cyber security software and systems; health system solutions, such as sterilization, patient, baby, hospital textile, hospital fixtures, medical equipment, and hospital warehouse tracking systems; and SAP solutions, including SAP ERP, business analytics, mobile, business management solution, and CRM solutions. It also offers enterprise software solutions, such as corporate information and access management systems, corporate identity systems, enterprise equipment tracking systems, e-government projects, RFID-based software and integration solutions, vehicle tracking and security control systems, logistic warehouse and container tracking systems, textile tracking and process management solutions, and social media tracking systems, as well as staff, visitor, and person tracking systems. In addition, the company provides cyber security and information system solutions, which include server and data storage, information infrastructure and data security, virtualization, disaster recovery center, and gateway security solutions, as well as system integration projects, high security data bearing equipment, traceability and process management applications, and components supply of enterprise information systems. Further, it offers command center and security, and smart technology solutions. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Ankara, Turkey. ARD Grup Bilisim Teknolojileri A.S. is a subsidiary of Ard Grup Holding Anonim Sirketi.

ARENA.IS.long_name: Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ARENA.IS.summary: Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the distribution of technology products in Turkey. It offers desktops, notebooks, printers, supplies, monitors, projections, memory cards, USB flash drives, SSDs, external and internal disc, DVD RWs, motherboards, graphic cards, workstations, thin client computers, wireless networks and ADSL, PC memory products, and accessories. The company also offers Bulutum.com, an end-to-end cloud services platform with pre-sales and post-sales technical support, training, and payment facilities that helps business partners to create business opportunities at software and managed services; Pencere.com, a communication and interaction portal; Paynet that provides payment, collection, and financial solutions to B2B, B2B2C, and B2C companies in various sectors, such as construction materials, marine materials, paint, health equipment, musical instruments, machinery, spare automotive parts, and others; and financial solutions. In addition, it provides Tencer-e.com, a communication and interaction portal that manages technical services and current account operations; and automation and IOT services. Further, the company is involved in the wholesale trading of mobile phones and other mobile devices; and online electronics retail and marketplace businesses. Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ARMDA.IS.long_name: Armada Bilgisayar Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ARMDA.IS.summary: Armada Bilgisayar Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a distributor in the information technology sector in Turkey. It offers IT products and solutions to end users through business partners. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Armada Bilgisayar Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Aptec Holdings Limited.

ARZUM.IS.long_name: Arzum Elektrikli Ev Aletleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ARZUM.IS.summary: Arzum Elektrikli Ev Aletleri San. ve Tic. AS engages in the manufacture and supply of household appliances for households worldwide. It offers food preparation, cooking, frying, beverage preparation, cleaning, personal care, iron, baby products, day gifts, and accessories. The company sells its products through authorized retail points. Arzum Elektrikli Ev Aletleri San. ve Tic. AS was formerly known as Guney Ithalat Kollektif Sirketi. The company was founded in 1953 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey with additional offices in Hong Kong and Turkey.

DESPC.IS.long_name: Despec Bilgisayar Pazarlama ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
DESPC.IS.summary: Despec Bilgisayar Pazarlama ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi distributes ICT consumables in Turkey and internationally. It offers toners, ink cartridges, and tape backup and paper products; and IT accessories and mobile products. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ESCOM.IS.summary: Escort Teknoloji Yatirim A.S. provides technology-based products, solutions, and services in Turkey and internationally. The company offers consumer electronic products, such as DSLR and compact cameras, lenses, mobile and tripod models, and carrying bags; and data and power communication infrastructure solutions comprising structured cabling products that can be used in various types of applications, including data centers, rack cabinets, cable ducts, office sockets, and power distribution units. It also engages in the purchase, assembly, sale, export, and import of computer programs, computer printers, and various electronic and electrical equipment, as well as machinery and devices and their spare parts. In addition, the company generates solar based renewable energy. It provides products and solutions in the field of information and energy infrastructure, banking, military, and industrial electronics. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

IHEVA.IS.long_name: Ihlas Ev Aletleri Imalat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
IHEVA.IS.summary: Ihlas Ev Aletleri Imalat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells small home appliances. It offers cleaning robots, water heaters, water purifiers, carpet washing machine, tea-maker, vacuum cleaners shampooers, and vacuum cleaners under Aura, Aura Cleanmax, Aura Roboclean, Aura Cebilon, Aura QVac, Aura Livac, and Aura Wdry brands. The company sells its products through dealer networks and distributors. Ihlas Ev Aletleri Imalat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

INDES.IS.long_name: Indeks Bilgisayar Sistemleri Mühendislik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
INDES.IS.summary: Indeks Bilgisayar Sistemleri MÃ¼hendislik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi, through its subsidiaries, distributes IT products in Turkey. It operates through Information Technology, Telecom, Logistics, and Leasing segments. The company sells PCs, notebooks, servers, peripherals, software, and OEM products; and CPUs, hard disks, mother boards, VGA cards, monitors, laser printers, and backup hardware, as well as optical, server, memory, and security products. It also offers consumables, moveable data storage media, accessories, and papers; and corporate network systems, structural network components, cable products, corporate telephone systems, and network security and ADSL communication solutions, as well as logistics and transportation services. In addition, the company sells spare parts; offers logistics and rental services; and trades in household electronics. It distributes its products through a network of system integrators, value added dealers, and regular dealers, as well as retail channels, including retail chains, regular computer stores, and e-retail. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

KAREL.IS.long_name: Karel Elektronik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.
KAREL.IS.summary: Karel Elektronik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. designs, develops, produces, and sells wired or wireless communication systems in Turkey. It offers communication products, such as PBX phone systems for small, medium, and large scale businesses; IP based call center systems for public and private institutions; and IP, analog, wall, hotel, and feature phones, as well as direct station select modules, and operator phone headsets. The company also provides convergence and integration products, including conference products, GSM terminals, wireless (DECT) systems, auto-attendant and voicemail modules, call traffic control systems, VoIP and network products, call recording systems, nurse call systems, and other products, as well as vehicle tracking systems. In addition, it offers visual communication and security systems comprising security cameras, intruder alarm, and intercoms; cloud solutions with Internet applications that facilitate the business processes, and provide economy and productivity for corporate users; and electronics manufacturing services, as well as undertakes telecommunication and defense industry projects. The company provides its communication solutions for transportation sector, hotels and touristic facilities, public institutions, hospitals and medical institutions, universities and educational institutions, factories and industrial production facilities, merchandising and retail business, banks, leasing and factoring companies, equity houses, and other financial institutions. It also exports its products and technologies to approximately 30 countries. Karel Elektronik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

KFEIN.IS.summary: Kafein Yazilim Hizmetleri Ticaret A.S. provides various software solutions and services in Turkey and internationally. The company offers intelligent emotion analysis that enables emotion recognition and classification through real-time image or video capturing; facial recognition system that provides instant demographic analysis; personal data protection projects, which allows companies to discover and correctly configure sensitive data; smart parking system to find the closest available parking area, as well as provides automatic transaction option and allows payments without leaving the vehicle; and insurance management system to monitor insurance inventories and policies. It also provides corporate directory application to facilitate in-house communication; robotic process automation, an automatic execution of processes and operations of employees through a software; K-BI, a business intelligence platform where companies can run their performance analysis and report automatically; and K-Reward, a reward management system. In addition, the company offers turnkey projects, managed, integration projects, data management, technology and software development, and consultancy services. It serves telecommunication, insurance, finance and banking, retail, healthcare, manufacturing, and other industries. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

KRONT.IS.summary: Kron TelekomÃ¼nikasyon Hizmetleri A.S. provides technology solutions for the operational efficiency and security needs of the corporates in the finance, energy, healthcare, and telecommunications sectors worldwide. It offers Privileged Session Manager that monitors and controls privileged sessions on critical systems; Dynamic Password Controller, which eliminates the risk of sharing privileged passwords; Two-Factor Authentication that enhances data access security; Database Access Manager & Dynamic Data Masking, which is the single point of access control management for database layer, secures data access with logging, policy enforcement, and masking; Privileged Task Automation that provides a single interface to configure the ability of network business flows; and Unified Access Manager, which offers built-in and pre-integrated TACACS+ and RADIUS servers that provide authentication, authorization, and accounting (AAA) services. The company also provides Single Connect, a defense security architecture against insider threats; Single Monitor that discovers, monitors, and manages infrastructure; Marta AAA, a modular and scalable telco-grade AAA solution; CG-Logger, a logging solution for carrier grade NAT providers; Quality Assurance, a distributed platform that enables scenario and modeling driven proactive network and services quality measurements; and Secure Cloud Wi-Fi, a carrier grade Wi-Fi access control solution for large enterprises. Kron TelekomÃ¼nikasyon Hizmetleri A.S. was founded in 2007 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

LINK.IS.long_name: Link Bilgisayar Sistemleri Yazilimi ve Donanimi Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
LINK.IS.summary: Link Bilgisayar Sistemleri Yazilimi ve Donanimi Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a software development company in Turkey. The company develops integrated business application software that covers various accounting, production, and commercial operational requirements. Its software products include modules for tracking sales, marketing, purchasing, inventory management, warehouse-store management, current accounts, finance, accounting, production, budget planning, human resources, and fixed assets operations. The company also offers sales and after sales training, and support services through a network of approximately 500 authorized resellers and dealers. It distributes its products through distributor and business partner companies. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

LOGO.IS.long_name: Logo Yazilim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
LOGO.IS.summary: Logo Yazilim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. develops software solutions in Turkey and internationally. The company provides ERP solutions, which include Logo j-Platform, Logo Tiger Wings Enterprise, Logo Tiger 3 Enterprise, Logo Tiger Wings, Logo Tiger 3, Logo Netsis Wings Enterprise, Logo Netsis 3 Enterprise, Logo Netsis Wings, and Logo Netsis 3 Standard; and business analytics solutions, such as Logo Mind Insight, Logo Mind Navigator, and Logo Mind Budget. It also offers e-Invoice, e-Archive invoice, e-Ledger, e-Dispatch, e-Producer Receipt, e-Reconciliation, e-Extract, Connect Banka, Connect B2b, eLogo e-Tahsilat, and e-Self-Employment Invoice; Logo Isbasi, Logo Start 3, Logo GO Wings, Logo GO 3, Logo Netsis Wings Entegre, Logo Netsis 3 Entegre, and Logo Mali MÃ¼savir 3; warehouse management system solutions, consisting of Logo WMS Platform and Logo WMS; Logo Mobile Sales; and Logo Total Soft products, such as Logo Charisma ERP, Logo Charisma HCM, Logo Charisma Analyzer, Logo Charisma Medical Software, and Logo Charisma Leasing. In addition, the company provides human resources solutions, consisting of Logo j-HR, Logo Tiger 3 HR, Logo Bordro Plus, Logo Netsis 3 HR, Logo Netsis 3 Bordro, and Logo Payroll; retail solutions, including Logo Diva Retail, Logo Diva Service, Logo Diva Channel, and Logo Diva Shop; ecosystem solutions; Logo Infosoft products, such as Logo Jugnu Â ERP, Logo SMART DMS & SFA, and Logo CaptainBiz; CRM solutions, which includes Logo CRM; and project solutions that comprises of Logo Treasury Wizard and Logo B2B. Further, it offers work flow management solutions, such as Logo Flow; occupational health and safety, consisting of eLogo ISG; and digital transformation services, including digital transformation consultancy, project management, project implementation, custom software development, customization and integration, post-project support services, and system management. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Gebze, Turkey.

NETAS.IS.summary: Netas TelekomÃ¼nikasyon A.S. provides solutions in information and communication technologies in Turkey and internationally. The company operates Enterprise, Public, International, Technology, Telecom, and BDH segments. It manufactures and trades in telecommunication equipment; and provides project installation services, technical support, repair and maintenance services, IT, strategic outsourcing, implementation, and related services. The company offers solutions to its customers in core competencies, including mobile broadband, cyber security, cloud computing, business applications, and big data. It also offers end-to-end value added solutions, such as technology consulting and after-sales support services in countries, such as Bangladesh, Pakistan, and Nepal in the Asia-Pacific; Azerbaijan, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan, and Kazakhstan in the Turkic Republics; Tunisia, Algeria, and Morocco in North Africa; and Saudi Arabia. The company serves financial institutions and telecommunication service providers; public and public security, energy, sports and entertainment, retail and fast consumption, and transport industries; and smart campuses and buildings. Netas TelekomÃ¼nikasyon A.S. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

PENTA.IS.long_name: Penta Teknoloji Urunleri Dagitim Ticaret A.S.
PENTA.IS.summary: Penta Teknoloji Urunleri Dagitim Ticaret A.S. engages in the distribution of technology products in Turkey. It offers personal computers, PC components, peripherals and accessories, software, server-storage and networking products, and documentation solutions. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

RCAA.SG.summary: ArÃ§elik Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, produces, markets, sells, services, imports, and exports consumer durable goods and consumer electronics in Turkey and internationally. It operates through White Goods, Consumer Electronics, and Other segments. The company offers built-in and freestanding appliances, such as refrigerators, freezers, washing machines, dryers, dishwashers, ovens, hobs, hoods, warming drawers, microwave ovens, and water dispensers and water filtration appliances; and small household appliances, including vacuum and steam cleaners, kitchen appliances, personal and garment care appliances, and fans. It also provides consumer electronics comprising televisions, computers, smart phones, notebooks and tablets, POS cash registers, Hi-Fi systems, and portable audio systems; and heating and ventilation systems consisting of air conditioners, boilers, and water and room heaters. In addition, the company offers components, which include hermetic compressors, industrial motors, and appliances motor-pumps; and furnitures. It offers its products under the ArÃ§elik, Beko, Blomberg, Arctic, Grundig, Altus, Flavel, Elektrabregenz, Leisure, Defy, and Dawlance brands. The company was incorporated in 1955 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

SMART.IS.summary: Smartiks Yazilim A.S. provides business solution, software development, and consulting services in Turkey. The company's solutions include Oracle Human Resources, Oracle Siebel CRM, Oracle customer experience, corporate software development, Internet of Things, and SmartXperience solutions. It serves health, insurance, banking and finance, retail, automotive, public, and telecom sectors. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

TKCN.MX.summary: Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri A.S. provides digital services in Turkey, Ukraine, Belarus, Azerbaijan, Cyprus, Germany, and the Netherlands. It operates through two segments, Turkcell Turkey and Turkcell International. It offers voice, data, and video communication solutions to its individual and corporate customers; and broadband services. The company also provides BiP, an all-access communication service application; TV+, which enables subscribers to watch series and other TV contents whenever and wherever they want; fizy, a digital music platform; Lifebox, a cloud data storage service; Dergilik, a digital publishing platform; Yaani, a search engine application; Digital Operator, an application for its customers to view and pay their bills, access packages, and make transactions; Turkcell Academy identifies training needs and provides trainings in areas of employee development; and Kopilot, an application that offers car driving experience with various features. In addition, it offers digital business, techfin, big data processing, business intelligence applications, location based services and platforms, customer relationship management and solutions, network management solutions, value added services, mobile financial systems, IPTV services, mobile marketing solutions, Internet of Things, geographic information systems, voice identification, AR/VR, 5G infrastructure projects, campaign management systems, image and video processing based on artificial intelligence, text analysis, suggestion engines, voice analytics, robot assistants, robotics process automation, mobile analytical platforms, digital broadcast solutions, content delivery network solutions, over-the-top, and block chain solutions; artificial intelligence in health, learning and education applications solutions; trades in electricity; consumer financing and insurance agency; and property investments services. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

VESBE.IS.long_name: Vestel Beyaz Esya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
VESBE.IS.summary: Vestel Beyaz Esya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures electronics and household appliances in Turkey, Europe, and internationally. The company produces refrigerators, room air conditioning units, washing machines, cookers, dishwashers, water heaters, freezers, and dryers. It also exports its products to 156 countries. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Vestel Beyaz Esya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Vestel Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.

VESTL.IS.long_name: Vestel Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
VESTL.IS.summary: Vestel Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells brown and white goods in Turkey. The company operates through three segments: Television and Electronic Devices, White Goods, and Other. The company provides refrigerators, washing machines, tumble dryers, cookers, ovens, water heaters, dishwashers, and air-conditioners. It also offers televisions; set-top boxes (STB); visual solutions; smartphones and tablets; LED lighting; smart home, smart walking stick, smart mirror, integrated television STB, smart test platform, user experience and interface cloud architecture, artificial intelligence, and cyber security solutions; and electric vehicle charging stations. The company markets and sells its products under the Vestel brand name. It sells its products through 976 Vestel stores, 886 Regal sales points, 9 Vs outlets, and online sales stores, as well as through household stores, technology retailers, hypermarkets, and e-commerce sites. The company also exports its products to Europe and internationally. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Vestel Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Zorlu Holding A.S.
